amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce by $8 million funding for energy supply, research and development activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed as amendment No. 32 in the Congressional Record of June 28, that reduces by $8 million the appropriation for energy supply, research and development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Volkmer amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 275 (Roll no. 490).
